002.synopsis: Eagerly awaiting the next steps from their leader Wulbren. Ready to do whatever he directs. If Wulbren or Nimble are dead, he'll be noticably more downbeat.
002.how_to_trigger: 1. run oe SCE_SetupGnomes_SetFlags2. Runoe SCE_SetupGnomes_AllGnomes-or-oe SCE_SetupGnomes_NoBarcus-or-oe SCE_SetupGnomes_DeadN-or-oe SCE_SetupGnomes_DeadWulbren3. Run oe SCE_SetupDebrief4. Go to Act 2 Coordinates X:-166 Y:-170 (Moonrise Bazaar)5. Engage one of the gnomes in dialogue

001.synopsis: Eagerly awaiting the next steps from their leader Wulbren. Ready to do whatever he directs. If Wulbren's dead they'll be noticably more downbeat.
001.how_to_trigger: 1. run oe SCE_SetupGnomes_SetFlags2. Runoe SCE_SetupGnomes_AllGnomes-or-oe SCE_SetupGnomes_NoBarcus-or-oe SCE_SetupGnomes_DeadN-or-oe SCE_SetupGnomes_DeadWulbren3. Run oe SCE_SetupDebrief4. Go to Act 2 Coordinates X:-166 Y:-170 (Moonrise Bazaar)5. Engage one of the gnomes in dialogue

002_0.speaker: Nickels
002_0.text: It'll take time, but this tower's stone will heal.

002_1.speaker: Nickels
002_1.context: NodeContext: Mourning the death of a friend

002_2.speaker: Nickels
002_2.text: Where do we go now? Where's home?
002_2.context: NodeContext: reflecting on the death of a leader

001_1.speaker: Nimble
001_1.text: Moonrise has been cleansed - Baldur's Gate is next.

001_2.speaker: Nimble
001_2.text: I just - I don't know what to do.

001_3.speaker: Nimble
001_3.text: I can't believe Wulbren managed to get us through this.

001_4.speaker: Nimble
001_4.text: I can't believe Wulbren's gone. Reviving the Ironhands, returning to Baldur's Gate - it all rested on him.

001_0.speaker: Nimble
001_0.text: Gods. What will I tell the others?
